author: ceki
msg: Added JMSSink to listen to logging events sent by clients.

author: ceki
msg: Moved the Hiearchy._default variable to Category._default such that the Hiearchy class does no longer
have a static initiliazer. This fixes a very confusing NullPointerException occuring on rare occasions.

author: ceki
msg: The NTEventLogAppender now works under JDK 1.1.x. Updated the FAQ and INSTALL to reflect this good news.

author: ceki
msg: The JMSAppender is just a sketch but at least it compiles (if you have JMQ installed).

author: ceki
msg: Catch block catching a RunTimeException do not generate compile warnings even after a try
block that will never throw such an exception.
